comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
The list of block types this item can be placed on in Adventure mode.
This is only applicable to block items.
The block names are displayed in the item's tooltip.
Setting the value to undefined will clear the list.

comments.name: param
comments.value: String list of block types that the item can be placed on.

comments.name: throws
comments.value: Throws if the slot's container is invalid. Also throws if any of the provided block identifiers are invalid.
